com.ep.ggs.API.server

Class ServerChatEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ep.ggs.API.Event
      • com.ep.ggs.API.server.ServerEvent
        • com.ep.ggs.API.server.ServerChatEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancelable

    public class ServerChatEvent
extends ServerEvent
implements Cancelable
    This event is executed when the console sends a global message. The console must use the Console.sendGlobalMessage(String), or execute/handle the event on its own. If the end user is using a launcher that does not use the sendGlobalMessage method and the launcher does not execute the event, then this event will never be called.
